ovdesc.p: This file has the cross reference of Account Number and BL.BILL id for which the Account number attahced for Drawdown / Principal Liquidation / Interest Liquidation / Charges Account.

desc.p: The id to this file is the valid account which is given in BL.BILL as Drawdown or Principal Liquidation or Interest Liquidation or Charge debit account.
Valid BL.BILL id to which the account number has been given for Drawdown or Principal Liquidation or Interest Liquidation or Charge debit.
